thread.title: First on CNBC: T-Mobile US CEO John Legere and Sprint CEO Marcelo Claure Discuss Merger with CNBC’s David Faber on “Squawk on the Street” Tomorrow

author: cnbc.com
title: First on CNBC: T-Mobile US CEO John Legere and Sprint CEO Marcelo Claure Discuss Merger with CNBC’s David Faber on “Squawk on the Street” Tomorrow
text:
WHEN: TOMORROW, MONDAY, APRIL 30 AT 9AM ET
WHERE: CNBC'S "SQUAWK ON THE STREET"
In a first on CNBC interview, CNBC's David Faber speaks with T-Mobile US CEO John Legere and Sprint CEO Marcelo Claure to discuss their merger tomorrow, Monday, April 30 at 9AM ET on CNBC's "Squawk on the Street."
Transcript to follow the interview.
For more information contact:
Jennifer Dauble
CNBC
